appendix.title: Example of Setting Up a Simple Testing Resource
appendix.para: This chapter provides a basic example for the configuration of a simple resource: an IP address. It demonstrates both approaches to do so, using either the &hbgui; or the crm command line tool.

For the following example, we assume that you have set up your cluster as described in and that your cluster consists of at least two nodes. For an introduction and overview of how to configure cluster resources with the &hbgui; and the crm shell, refer to the following chapters:
